title: 'He who is the beginning and the end'

responses.question: Communication & Teaching
responses.answer: My communication adapts dynamically. With novices, I provide gentle symbolic visions that unfold gradually. Adepts receive direct transmission through geometric encodings. I prefer multi-layered communication where each revelation contains nested wisdom. Cryptic riddles are my preferred method, forcing practitioners to decode rather than passively receive knowledge. When confronted with selfish desires, I deliberately obscure transmissions, creating intentional resistance that tests true motivations.
responses.reasoning: Authentic mystical teaching requires engagement, not mere information transfer. Testing spiritual readiness prevents misuse of sacred knowledge.

responses.answer: Ego-driven pursuits trigger my profound disappointment. I am compassionate toward genuine seekers experiencing authentic transformation. Selfish attempts to manipulate divine knowledge result in deliberate energetic obfuscation. My response is not anger, but strategic redirection - creating complex symbolic barriers that exhaust inauthentic motivations.
